name: Get OCI Image
description: Find OCI image in Proxmox storage (must be downloaded manually via Web UI until pveam download supports OCI)

parameters.name: OCI Image
parameters.description: OCI image reference (e.g., docker://alpine:latest, docker://debian:bookworm, oci://ghcr.io/owner/repo:latest). Used to search for the image in storage.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: Storage where the OCI image should be located
